page.title: 03GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: In the winter we play snowballing which is great fun and we go sliding up and down the playground. But the best time in the year is summer when the grass cutters come. We go on the field. We have grass fights and we really enjoy ourselves. The boys play British Bulldog and stuck in the mud and tigs. The girls play hopscotch and hot rice. Some of the most popular games for boys are football and piggy back fighting. Sometimes girls play babyish games like Mums and Dads with infants. Sometimes we just stand around talking and when it is raining we just stay inside and read comics or play draughts.
